content: 24 times 10 double_crochet in the back loop the 6th is made in the fpdc3-decrease fpdc around fpdc this is my carpet after one kilometer of 3 mm string and 6 hours of work magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #25 repeat 24 times 4 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpquadtr around the previous front-post stitch from round #24 6 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpdc around the next front-post stitch round #26 repeat 24 times 4 double_crochet in the back loop 3 fpdc around the fpquadtr 6 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpdc around fpdc round #27 repeat 24 times 2 double_crochet in the back loop dc2-decrease in the back loop fpdc-increase fpdc fpdc-increase dc2-decrease in the back loop 4 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc round #28 repeat 24 times 2 double_crochet in the back loop double_crochet-increase in the back loop fpdc2-decrease fpdc fpdc2-decrease double_crochet-increase in the back loop 4 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc round #29 repeat 24 times 3 double_crochet in the back loop double_crochet-increase in the back loop fpdc3-decrease 6 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc round #30 repeat 24 times 12 double_crochet in the back loop the 6th falls into fpdc3-decrease fpdc magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #31 repeat 24 times 8 double_crochet in the back loop fpquadtr around the next fpdc from round #29 that s two rounds before 4 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc around fpdc from round #30 round #32 repeat 24 times 8 double_crochet in the back loop 3 fpdc around fpquadtr 4 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc around fpdc round #33 repeat 24 times 6 double_crochet in the back loop dc2-decrease in the back loop fpdc-increase fpdc fpdc-increase dc2-decrease in the back loop 2 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc around fpdc round #34 this will be an easy round every stitch is worked through as it is if you see an ordinary double_crochet make a double_crochet in the back loop if you see a fpdc make a fpdc around it this is my carpet after 2 kilometers of 3 mm string and 12 hours of work magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #35 repeat 24 times 6 double_crochet in the back loop double_crochet-increase in the back loop fpdc2-decrease 1 fpdc
